Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Toy Horse
Description: The toy horse has four wheels and was used in daily life. The neck of the horse is pierced but there are no ornaments or details on its body.This toy gives us an idea about the games and toy figures preferred by the children at that time. The skills of the Coptic carpenters are evident in their use of local types of woods, such as the acacia and the sycamore
